text: Greco Belgica (second from right), along with other PDDS officers, when they sought accreditation to run in the 2019 elections. Pederalismo ng Dugong Dakilang Samahan (PDDS; roughly translated into English as "Noble Blood Association of Federalists") is a political party in the Philippines. Founded by Greco Belgica, he says that the members are the original followers of Philippine president Rodrigo Duterte in the 2016 presidential election. The main thrust of the party is for federalism to be applied to the Philippines. The party sought accreditation from the Commission on Elections so that it can run candidates for the 2019 midterm election. Belgica said that their "number 1" candidate is Special Assistant to the President Bong Go. Eduardo Gadiano, their gubernatorial candidate in Occidental Mindoro is their highest ranking elected official. PDDS did not win seats in the House of Representatives, with all of its 31 candidates losing. == See also == * PDP–Laban, Duterte's political party * Partido Federal ng Pilipinas, another pro-Duterte and federalist party. == References == == External links == *Pederalismo ng Dugong Dakilang Samahan on Facebook Category:Conservative parties in the Philippines Category:2020 establishments in the Philippines
